room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: This was my first escape room and I was nervous because I had no idea what to expect. It turned out to be one of the most exciting, engaging and entertaining experiences I’ve ever had in the city. The person I was with is an escape room veteran, and he said afterwards that “The Meltdown” was by far the best designed room he had been in. I will definitely be back again.

room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: Our group did The Meltdown. There were four of us, and we were grouped with a trio. Compared to other escape the rooms, it didn't look quite as exciting inside - I've seen more "cool" or shocking rooms/puzzles. That being said, it was super fun, and it's always better when you make it out in time ;)

room_title: Escape room "The Agency" by Escape The Room NYC in New York
review: Visited ETR with a friend. It was my first time and it was great!!! Coming back with my husband very soon.
